#!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh"
require_cmd opendiff "Opendiff comes with Apple's developer tools."
# set utf-8 as the default encoding (used by opendiff) export __CF_USER_TEXT_ENCODING=$UID:0x8000100:0x8000100
eval arr=("$TM_SELECTED_FILES") if [[ ${#arr[@]} == 2 ]]; then opendiff "${arr[0]}" "${arr[1]}"; rescan_project else echo -e "You need to select exactly two\nfiles in the project drawer." fi
